serveur

Class FtpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • serveur.FtpRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FtpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class used to manage the ftp request through few administrator class.
